word: JOSHUA 24:26: “AND JOSHUA WROTE THESE WORDS IN THE BOOK OF THE LAW OF GOD, AND TOOK A GREAT STONE, AND SET IT UP THERE UNDER AN OAK, THAT WAS BY THE SANCTUARY OF THE LORD.” THE STONE AND THE OAK WERE IN PALESTINE, BUT THEY WERE BY THE SANCTUARY OF THE LORD—NOT IN IT. AND THE OTHER TEXT IS MORE RESTRICTIVE STILL, AND EQUALLY CONCLUSIVE AGAINST THE INFERENCE TO WHICH REFERENCE IS HEREIN MADE.
